topic.title: Functional Status Result Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: This clinical statement represents details of an evaluation or assessment of a patient's functional status. The evaluation may include assessment of a patient's language, vision, hearing, activities of daily living, behavior, general function, mobility, and self-care status. The statement, if present, will include supporting caregivers, non-medical devices, and the time period for which the evaluation and assessment were performed.
